entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the main character in the text. The twins and Ron's mother are aware of who he is.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is one of the twins who is on the train with Harry.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is the other twin who is on the train with Harry.

entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: Ronald Weasley is Ron's full name and he is mentioned as having something on his nose.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is the oldest boy in the family who comes striding into sight.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as having something on his nose and also being teased by his siblings.

relationships.description: Harry Potter knows Fred Weasley, as they are both on the same train.
Harry Potter knows George Weasley, as they are both on the same train.
Fred Weasley is Ronald Weasley's brother.
George Weasley is Ronald Weasley's brother.
Percy Weasley is Fred Weasley's brother.
Percy Weasley is George Weasley's brother.
Ronald Weasley is Fred Weasley's brother.
Ronald Weasley is George Weasley's brother.
Fred Weasley and Percy Weasley are siblings.
George Weasley and Percy Weasley are siblings.
Ronald Weasley and Percy Weasley are siblings.
